snippet: A disgraced former journalist was charged on Friday with making a wave of bomb threats to Jewish organizations while posing as an ex-girlfriend in retaliation for breaking up with him....

headline.main: Moroccan Designer's Embroidery School Revives Fading Art
headline.print_headline: Moroccan Designer's Embroidery School Revives Fading Art

lead_paragraph: A disgraced former journalist was charged on Friday with making a wave of bomb threats to Jewish organizations while posing as an ex-girlfriend in retaliation for breaking up with him.
